rows.question: I have a dataset to store. What do I do now?

rows.title: question_c5

rows.title: question_d2

rows.title: question_i1
rows.question: How can I store data for the long term?
rows.message: Databases with a data preservation policy have been selected, based on your interest in long-term data storage. You may choose area(s) of research below.

rows.title: question_i2
rows.question: Which database is relevant to my dataset?
rows.message: Databases have been selected. You may search below for your terms relevant to your dataset.

rows.title: question_i3
rows.question: How can I get a persistent identifier for my data?
rows.message: Databases which use persistent identifiers have been selected; you may choose the relevant area(s) of research below.
